Posts.Content: hello, would really appreciate any info, as just my luck to be told i have something that i havent heard or read of before! i have just got back from seeing the breast surgeon who examined breasts and the area that i can feel a hardness and where most of the pain is he said is just very nodular, he advised me to have another ultrasound and a fna , the u/s again just showed cluster of nodules, the radiologist said he could see nothing suspicious but would do the fna to check what was causing so much pain, now i have to wait 4 days for the results, does anyone no anything about nodules? i was remarkably calm whilst at the hspt but started to get really anxious again, i have heard of cysts being painful but they are saying these are nodules and the brain is starting to go into overdrrive again. any ideas anyone please. thanks love dawn xxx
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
Posts.Title: more tests, any advice please

Posts.Content: hello thanks for your post. in answer to your quation the lymph node biopsy came back clear, haemotologist just said sometimes there are no resaons that they can find for the enlargement, still living in fear regarding the breast lump and the pain is so severe now that i can hardly move my arm, been back to my doctor who checked breast again and said there was no lump just lumpiness - i can feel a lump! he assured me that this wasnt breast cancer and that was inflamed breast tissue, i have asked to be reffered to a breast clinic on the nhs but he said this would take weeks as i dont have breast cancer! so i will just have to wait. but this coming right on top of the last 11 weeks of constant fear about big lymph node i am just in absolute pieces and very negative about the outcome, well i am off to bed now as at least when i am asleep the fear goes away for a while, even though the pain keeps on waking me up, does breast pain usually present as this severe, i have also read that most breast pain is when cancer is very advanced, if this is the case surely it would have been picked up on the mammogram/ultrasound, got all these constant terrifying thoughts going round in my mind, also lost my sister in law 3 years ago the same age as me to breast cancer, i think she was something like grade 4 straight from diagnosis and never had a, chance went downhill pretty quickly, thanks for reading dawn xx
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
Posts.Title: any advice please

Posts.Content: hello, been thinking about asking this question or not, dont want to scare myself. i am 39 and developed breast pain (mainly in left breast) two years ago, 10 weeks ago founf a lump, had mammogram and ultrasound carried out told that they were nodules, report says there is no evidence of malignancy and no discreet mass lesion(whatever that means) so basically given the all clear, but i am still worried as the breast pain gets so painful i cant bear to touch it at all or even lay on it when i am sleeping. havent really bothered to take note of when it comes and goes but does seem to appear 2 weeks before my period, but what is worying me now is that i finished my period 3 days ago and it is still their. i have just gone through a very worried time of having an enlarged lymph node in my neck removed and biopsied(given the all clear for that) dont think i can bear to start worrying about this now, any advice would be appreciated. thank you dawn
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
Posts.Title: any advice please

Posts.Content: thank you for taking the time to reply, im sorry if what i typed seemd off, but am so frightened at the moment and convinced i have breast cancer, already been through hell for 11 weeks waiting for lymph node to be removed and biopsied i was certain then i had lymphoma what with the hot flushes and itchiness as well, i suppose my mind at the moment is sure that everything is going to be cancer, the worst outcome. totally stressed out cant cope with the smalles of things it is really having a bad effect. i was completely reasured with the breast ultrasound and mammogram when the results came back no sign of malignancy, but im in the uk and i paid privately to have the mammogram and ultrasound as couldnt wait on the nhs, because i only paid for the xrays the consultant never explained fully to me what the results meant and what other reasons there could be for the bad pain and nodules , and after reading of peoples experiences on this site that they had clear mammograms and ultrasound it really frightened me, i guess im just looking for some reasurance to get me through another day until my doctors appt, because even if he does agree to sending me to a breast cliniic there will probably be a delay of 2/ 3 weeks, andcoming on top of the last 11 weeks with the last problem dont know how i am going to get through this. thanks again dawn x
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
Posts.Title: any advice please

Posts.Content: thank you for taking the time to reply, im sorry if what i typed seemd off, but am so frightened at the moment and convinced i have breast cancer, already been through hell for 11 weeks waiting for lymph node to be removed and biopsied i was certain then i had lymphoma what with the hot flushes and itchiness as well, i suppose my mind at the moment is sure that everything is going to be cancer, the worst outcome. totally stressed out cant cope with the smalles of things it is really having a bad effect. i was completely reasured with the breast ultrasound and mammogram when the results came back no sign of malignancy, but im in the uk and i paid privately to have the mammogram and ultrasound as couldnt wait on the nhs, because i only paid for the xrays the consultant never explained fully to me what the results meant and what other reasons there could be for the bad pain and nodules , and after reading of peoples experiences on this site that they had clear mammograms and ultrasound it really frightened me, i guess im just looking for some reasurance to get me through another day until my doctors appt, because even if he does agree to sending me to a breast cliniic there will probably be a delay of 2/ 3 weeks, andcoming on top of the last 11 weeks with the last problem dont know how i am going to get through this. thanks again dawn x
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
Posts.Title: any advice please

Posts.Content: hello, can you tell me if your doctor could actially find a lump? i have had two doctors feel my breast now and both said thay can feel no lump just nodules and this is what the mammogram and ultrasound have picked up, surely they must have some accuracy other wise why carry these tests out, i am totally confused now i have my doctor telling me i do not have cancer and there would be no where to actually stick a needle in to aspirate . i have quite small breasts, so i cant understand how two doctors would miss this, and risk being sued by me, surely if they had any doubts they would play it safe, the main thing that is worrying me is this really painful area in my breast that has been there for two weeks now, i dont know what to do we cant afford to pay for anymore private investigations and in the meantime i am beside myself with worry, and because of what the doctors have said my family think i am just being really silly and to just accept what the doctors have said. thanks dawn
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/

Posts.Title: any advice please

Posts.Content: what i was wondering, is that 66 people hav e read my question, that was typed because i am feeling so frightened, mainly due to reading various posts on this site telling women not to take notice of mammogram and ultrasound results if they came back clear as they still had breast cancer, understandably this has really frightened me now as was under the impression that the combination of both tests coming back clear was prety reliable, i am now wondering if some people take some kind of satisfatcion in scaring people, cant help feeling this way, i am under some stress at the moment, i came to this site in the hope of getting some information and help all that has happened is that i feel very frightened now and am actually a lot worse off.
Posts.Signature: i have been ill for two years now and am awaiting a biopsy on an enlarged node. i have been told by many doctors that there is nothing wrong and it is all in my head, so now even my family believe this i feel hopeless and very scared/
